markdownRemark.html:
We welcome students from every faculty, as well as non-students.

Usually, we would be at the September EUSA Frehers' Fair at Pleasance. However, the fair is most likely not going to happen this year. We are making plans on online auditions, so stay tuned.

If you are interested in joining EUSO, please contact the president about an audition. Please include your name, instrument and playing experience, and we will arrange a time for the auditions.
